content: then you re done if you have trouble telling what row you are on it can help to look at your fabric for some clues the stitches that are being slipped will alternate from row to row meaning you will slip the stitches that were not slipped our website is makermakerstore com and you can find our other free patterns on ravelry on the previous row https //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/maker-maker- the above picture shows the sequence you will work store/patterns based on the fabric shown happy making 2 designed by emily bolduan © maker maker 2019
